effect.Name: Division With Hyperbolic Tangent
effect.description: Division With Hyperbolic Tangent - Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic tangent
effect.author: Foxioo

parameter.name: /* Foxioo Division With Hyperbolic Tangent (Background) Shader | 1.1 (23.06.2024) */
parameter.description: Shader divides base and blend colors with each other then colors are calculated by hyperbolic tangent

parameter.name: Blending Mode
parameter.description: This variable decides which color the divider should be. When the option is off, the divisor is the base colors and when the option is on, the divisor is the blend colors

parameter.name: Mixing
parameter.description: This variable sets the intensity of base visibility
